Course information Useful additional resources Besides the madnatory and recommended reading for this course, there are some additional resources that are worth checking out: The command line. The Missing Semester of Your CS Education: MIT’s introduction course on mastering the command line. Some more command line. explainshell.com; for when you cannot figure it out with MIT’s introduction. Regular expressions. regexr.com; an online tool to develop and check your regular expressions. Mapmaking. colorbrewer 2.0; an online tool to select colour palettes for your maps and visualisations. Noticed a mistake? Please let us know through the GitHbu issues tab or contact us directly over e-mail and we’ll look into it.
